import React, { Component, lazy, Suspense } from 'react'; import { Badge, Button, ButtonDropdown, ButtonGroup, ButtonToolbar, Card, CardBody, CardFooter, CardHeader, CardTitle, Col, Collapse, Dropdown, DropdownItem, DropdownMenu, DropdownToggle, Fade, Form, FormGroup, FormText, FormFeedback, Input, InputGroup, InputGroupAddon, InputGroupButtonDropdown, InputGroupText, Label, Progress, Pagination, PaginationItem, PaginationLink, Row, Table, } from 'reactstrap'; class AlterarUsuario extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.onRadioBtnClick = this.onRadioBtnClick.bind(this); this.state = { fullname: '', email:'', cpf:'', bithdate:'', sex: '', radioSelected: 2, }; } clearFields = () => { this.setState({ fullname: '', email:'', cpf:'', birthdate:'', sex: '' }); } handleChange = event => { this.setState({ [event.target.id]: event.target.value }); } onRadioBtnClick(radioSelected) { this.setState({ sex: radioSelected.target.value, }); } render() { return (
{/* Filtro de Usuarios */} Filtrar Usuários
{/* Lista de Usuários */} Usuários {userList.map((user, index) => )}
Cód. Nome Cadastrado em. Perfil Status
Prev 1 2 3 4 Next
); } } export default AlterarUsuario;
